trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `DataSet` will not contain more than the number of records indicated by `maxRecords`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`DataSet`不會包含在所指定的記錄數目超過`maxRecords`。

trans-unit.source: However, the entire resultset generated by the query is still returned from the server.
trans-unit.target: 不過，從伺服器仍會傳回整個查詢所產生的結果集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> objects to fill from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>填入來自資料來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based record number to start with.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始使用以零為起始的記錄號碼。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的記錄數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> executed to fill the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref>執行，以填滿<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows added to or refreshed in the data tables.
trans-unit.target: 加入至或在資料表中重新整理的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>無效。

trans-unit.source: The source table is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 無效的來源資料表。

trans-unit.source: -or- The connection is invalid.
trans-unit.target: -或者-連接無效。

trans-unit.source: The connection could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到連接。

trans-unit.source: The startRecord parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: startRecord 參數小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- The maxRecords parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: -或- maxRecords 參數小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Adds or refreshes rows in a specified range in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to match those in the data source using the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and source table names, command string, and command behavior.
trans-unit.target: 加入或重新整理指定範圍中的資料列<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>以符合資料來源使用<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>和來源資料表名稱、 命令字串和命令行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method retrieves rows from the data source using the SELECT statement specified by an associated <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>方法會從使用 SELECT 陳述式指定由相關聯的資料來源擷取資料列<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection object associated with the SELECT statement must be valid, but it does not need to be open.
trans-unit.target: SELECT 陳述式相關聯的連接物件必須有效，但它不需要開啟。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is closed before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接已關閉之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>是呼叫，它會開啟擷取資料，然後關閉。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the connection is open before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> is called, it remains open.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接為開啟之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>是呼叫，它會保持開啟狀態。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> operation then adds the rows to destination <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, creating the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects if they do not already exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>作業接著會將資料列加入到目的地<xref:System.Data.DataTable>中的物件<xref:System.Data.DataSet>、 建立<xref:System.Data.DataTable>如果它們尚不存在的物件。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: When creating <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> operation normally creates only column name metadata.
trans-unit.target: 建立時<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>作業通常會建立只有資料行名稱中繼資料。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>屬性設定為`AddWithKey`，也會建立適當的主索引鍵和條件約束。</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> encounters duplicate columns while populating a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>遇到重複的資料行在填入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，它會產生後續的資料行，並使用模式的名稱"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3 」，依此類推。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們會放置於<xref:System.Data.DataSet>根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，等等。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When multiple result sets are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> each result set is placed in a separate table.
trans-unit.target: 當多個結果集加入至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>放置於個別的資料表中每個結果集。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on).
trans-unit.target: 其他結果集的命名方式是附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"等等） 的整數值。

trans-unit.source: Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料行和資料表名稱的應用程式應確保這些命名模式衝突不會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method supports scenarios where the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains multiple <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects whose names differ only by case.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>方法支援案例其中<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含多個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>名稱只有大小寫不同的物件。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: In such situations, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> performs a case-sensitive comparison to find the corresponding table, and creates a new table if no exact match exists.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>執行區分大小寫的比較，來尋找對應的資料表，並建立新的資料表，如果沒有完全相符項目存在。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# code illustrates this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 程式碼說明這個行為。

trans-unit.source: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); dataset.Tables.Add("AAA"); adapter.Fill(dataset, "aaa"); // Fills "aaa", which already exists in the DataSet. adapter.Fill(dataset, "Aaa"); // Adds a new table called "Aaa". ``` If <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> is called and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains only one <xref:System.Data.DataTable> whose name differs only by case, that <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is updated.
trans-unit.target: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); dataset.Tables.Add("AAA"); adapter.Fill(dataset, "aaa"); // Fills "aaa", which already exists in the DataSet. adapter.Fill(dataset, "Aaa"); // Adds a new table called "Aaa". ```如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>稱為和<xref:System.Data.DataSet>只包含<xref:System.Data.DataTable>名稱只有大小寫不同的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>會更新。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the comparison is case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，這個比較是不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following C# code illustrates this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 程式碼說明這個行為。

trans-unit.source: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); adapter.Fill(dataset, "AAA"); // Fills table "aaa" because only one similarly named table is in the DataSet. ``` You can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method multiple times on the same <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); adapter.Fill(dataset, "AAA"); // Fills table "aaa" because only one similarly named table is in the DataSet. ```您可以使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>多次於相同<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>方法</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a primary key exists, incoming rows are merged with matching rows that already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果主索引鍵存在，內送資料列會合併具有相符的資料列已經存在。

trans-unit.source: If no primary key exists, incoming rows are appended to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有主索引鍵存在，內送資料列會附加至<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If the `SelectCommand` returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> value for the resulting <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`SelectCommand`傳回結果的 OUTER JOIN，`DataAdapter`未設定<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>值，產生<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly define the primary key to ensure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly.
trans-unit.target: 您必須明確定義主索引鍵，以確保正確解析重複的資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see[Defining Primary Keys](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[定義主索引鍵](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> for a .NET Framework data provider retrieves schema information for only the first result.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時處理批次 SQL 陳述式會傳回多個結果，實作<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>對於.NET Framework 資料提供者擷取結構描述資訊，只有第一個結果。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to fill with records and, if necessary, schema.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>填滿記錄，如有必要，結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based record number to start with.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始使用以零為起始的記錄號碼。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的記錄數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The name of the source table to use for table mapping.
trans-unit.target: 要用於資料表對應的來源資料表的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The SQL SELECT statement used to retrieve rows from the data source.
trans-unit.target: SQL SELECT 陳述式用於從資料來源擷取資料列。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows successfully added to or refreshed in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 資料列數目已成功加入，或在中重新整理<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.
trans-unit.target: 這不包括不傳回資料列的陳述式所影響的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The source table is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 無效的來源資料表。

trans-unit.source: The startRecord parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: startRecord 參數小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- The maxRecords parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: -或- maxRecords 參數小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the behavior of the command used to fill the data adapter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來填滿資料配接器的命令的行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref> of the command used to fill the data adapter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"> </xref>用來填滿資料配接器的命令。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> named "Table" to the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>指定名為"Table" <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>並設定基礎結構描述要比對資料來源中指定<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the schema information from the data source using the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從使用<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>的資料來源擷取的結構描述資訊

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> operation adds a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> to the destination <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>作業會將加入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>到目的地<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then adds columns to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, and configures the following <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> properties if they exist at the data source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 接著它會加入至資料行<xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，並設定下列<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>屬性如果存在於資料來源:- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: You must set <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> separately.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A>個別。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> also configures the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A> properties according to the following rules: - If one or more primary key columns are returned by the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, they are used as the primary key columns for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>-<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>也會設定<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A>屬性根據下列規則:-如果一或多個主索引鍵資料行所傳回的<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>，它們會當做<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>的主索引鍵資料行</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A></xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A></xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A></xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if, and only if, all the unique columns are nonnullable.
trans-unit.target: -如果傳回沒有主索引鍵資料行，但是唯一的資料行，唯一的資料行可用的主索引鍵，如果且只有唯一的資料行都不可為 null。

trans-unit.source: If any of the columns are nullable, a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>, but the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何資料行可為 null，<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>加入至<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>，但<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>屬性未設定。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: - If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: -如果傳回主要索引鍵資料行，唯一的資料行，主索引鍵資料行作為主索引鍵資料行<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> according to the preceding rules, but other constraint types are not added.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，會將主索引鍵和唯一條件約束加入至<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>根據前述規則，但其他條件約束類型不會加入。</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>

trans-unit.source: If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果唯一叢集索引上的資料行或 SQL Server 資料表中的資料行定義和叢集索引中的資料行的名稱將會傳回一組個別的資料行上定義主索引鍵條件約束。

trans-unit.source: To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳回的主索引鍵資料行的名稱，使用指定名稱的主索引鍵的 SELECT 陳述式中的查詢提示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定查詢提示的詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Primary key information is used during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> to find and replace any rows whose key columns match.
trans-unit.target: 主索引鍵資訊會使用於<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>來尋找和取代其索引鍵資料行符合任何資料列。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this is not the desired behavior, use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> without requesting schema information.
trans-unit.target: 如果這不是所要的行為，使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>但未要求結構描述資訊。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> encounters duplicate columns while populating a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>遇到重複的資料行在填入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，它會產生後續的資料行，並使用模式的名稱"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3 」，依此類推。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們會放置於<xref:System.Data.DataSet>根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，等等。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When multiple result sets are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> each result set is placed in a separate table.
trans-unit.target: 當多個結果集加入至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>放置於個別的資料表中每個結果集。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on.).
trans-unit.target: 其他結果集的命名方式是附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"等。） 的整數值。

trans-unit.source: Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料行和資料表名稱的應用程式應確保這些命名模式衝突不會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> object associated with the select command must be valid, but it does not need to open.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>Select 命令相關聯的物件必須有效，但不需要開啟。</xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> is closed before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>前已關閉<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>是呼叫，它會開啟擷取資料，然後關閉。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>

trans-unit.source: If the connection is open before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called, it is left open.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接為開啟之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>是呼叫，它仍然為開啟狀態。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時處理批次 SQL 陳述式會傳回多個結果，實作<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>的.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 擷取結構描述資訊，只有第一個結果。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> with the <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> set to `AddWithKey`.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取多個結果的結構描述資訊，請使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>與<xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>設`AddWithKey`。</xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>, the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server appends a FOR BROWSE clause to the statement being executed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>，.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 會將 FOR BROWSE 子句附加至正在執行的陳述式。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should be aware of potential side effects, such as interference with the use of SET FMTONLY ON statements.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該注意潛在的副作用，例如使用 SET FMTONLY ON 陳述式的干擾。

trans-unit.source: See SQL Server Books Online for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 線上叢書 》。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to insert the schema in.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>插入結構描述中的。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref> values that specify how to insert the schema.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>指定如何插入結構描述的值。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> objects that were added to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合的參考<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>物件新增至<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Configures the schema of the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> based on the specified <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的結構描述<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>根據指定<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The FillSchema method retrieves the schema from the data source using the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: FillSchema 方法從資料來源使用<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>擷取結構描述

trans-unit.source: The connection object associated with the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> must be valid, but it does not need to be open.
trans-unit.target: 連接物件相關聯<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>必須有效，但它不需要開啟。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the connection is closed before FillSchema is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接已關閉 FillSchema 呼叫之前，它會開啟擷取資料，然後關閉。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is open before FillSchema is called, it remains open.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接為開啟，會在呼叫 FillSchema 之前，它會保持開啟。

trans-unit.source: A FillSchema operation returns a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: FillSchema 作業會傳回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: It then adds columns to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, and configures the following <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> properties if they exist at the data source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 接著它會加入至資料行<xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，並設定下列<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>屬性如果存在於資料來源:- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: You must set <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> separately.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A>個別。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> FillSchema also configures the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A> properties according to the following rules: - If a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> has already been defined for the `DataTable`, or the `DataTable` contains data, the `PrimaryKey` property will not be set.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A>FillSchema 也會設定<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A>屬性根據下列規則:-如果<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>已經定義為`DataTable`，或`DataTable`包含資料，`PrimaryKey`未設定屬性。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If one or more primary key columns are returned by the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, they are used as the primary key columns for the `DataTable`.
trans-unit.target: -如果一或多個主索引鍵資料行所傳回<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>，它們會做為主要索引鍵資料行`DataTable`。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if, and only if, all the unique columns are nonnullable.
trans-unit.target: -如果傳回沒有主索引鍵資料行，但是唯一的資料行，唯一的資料行可用的主索引鍵，如果且只有唯一的資料行都不可為 null。

trans-unit.source: If any of the columns are nullable, a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>, but the `PrimaryKey` property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何資料行可為 null，<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>加入至<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>，但`PrimaryKey`屬性未設定。</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: - If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the `DataTable`.
trans-unit.target: -如果傳回主要索引鍵資料行，唯一的資料行，主索引鍵資料行做為主要索引鍵資料行`DataTable`。

trans-unit.source: Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> according to the preceding rules, but other constraint types are not added.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，會將主索引鍵和唯一條件約束加入至<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>根據前述規則，但其他條件約束類型不會加入。</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>

trans-unit.source: This process may require several round-trips to the server.
trans-unit.target: 此程序可能需要數個往返到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果唯一叢集索引上的資料行或 SQL Server 資料表中的資料行定義和叢集索引中的資料行的名稱將會傳回一組個別的資料行上定義主索引鍵條件約束。

trans-unit.source: To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳回的主索引鍵資料行的名稱，使用指定名稱的主索引鍵的 SELECT 陳述式中的查詢提示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定查詢提示的詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> encounters duplicate columns while populating a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>遇到重複的資料行在填入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，它會產生後續的資料行，並使用模式的名稱"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3 」，依此類推。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們會放置於<xref:System.Data.DataSet>根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，等等。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When multiple result sets are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> each result set is placed in a separate table.
trans-unit.target: 當多個結果集加入至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>放置於個別的資料表中每個結果集。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on.).
trans-unit.target: 其他結果集的命名方式是附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"等。） 的整數值。

trans-unit.source: Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料行和資料表名稱的應用程式應確保這些命名模式衝突不會發生。

trans-unit.source: FillSchema does not return any rows.
trans-unit.target: FillSchema 不傳回任何資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method to add rows to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>要加入資料列至<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>方法</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of FillSchema for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的實作 FillSchema 的.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 時處理批次傳回多個結果的 SQL 陳述式，擷取結構描述資訊，只有第一個結果。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> with the <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> set to `AddWithKey`.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取多個結果的結構描述資訊，請使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>與<xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>設`AddWithKey`。</xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using FillSchema, the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server appends a FOR BROWSE clause to the statement being executed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 FillSchema 時，.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 會將 FOR BROWSE 子句附加至正在執行的陳述式中。

trans-unit.source: The user should be aware of potential side effects, such as interference with the use of SET FMTONLY ON statements.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該注意潛在的副作用，例如使用 SET FMTONLY ON 陳述式的干擾。

trans-unit.source: See SQL Server Books Online for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 線上叢書 》。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定查詢提示的詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Primary key information is used during <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> to find and replace any rows whose key columns match.
trans-unit.target: 主索引鍵資訊會使用於<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>來尋找和取代其索引鍵資料行符合任何資料列。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this is not the desired behavior, use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> without requesting schema information.
trans-unit.target: 如果這不是所要的行為，使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>但未要求結構描述資訊。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> encounters duplicate columns while populating a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>遇到重複的資料行在填入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，它會產生後續的資料行，並使用模式的名稱"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3 」，依此類推。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們會放置於<xref:System.Data.DataSet>根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，等等。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When multiple result sets are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> each result set is placed in a separate table.
trans-unit.target: 當多個結果集加入至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>放置於個別的資料表中每個結果集。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on.).
trans-unit.target: 其他結果集的命名方式是附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"等。） 的整數值。

trans-unit.source: Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料行和資料表名稱的應用程式應確保這些命名模式衝突不會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> method supports scenarios where the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains multiple <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects whose names differ only by case.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>方法支援案例其中<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含多個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>名稱只有大小寫不同的物件。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: In such situations, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> performs a case-sensitive comparison to find the corresponding table, and creates a new table if no exact match exists.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>執行區分大小寫的比較，來尋找對應的資料表，並建立新的資料表，如果沒有完全相符項目存在。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# code illustrates this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 程式碼說明這個行為。

trans-unit.source: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); dataset.Tables.Add("AAA"); adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "aaa"); // Fills the schema of "aaa", which already exists in the DataSet. adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "Aaa"); // Adds a new table called "Aaa". ``` If <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains only one <xref:System.Data.DataTable> whose name differs only by case, that <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is updated.
trans-unit.target: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); dataset.Tables.Add("AAA"); adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "aaa"); // Fills the schema of "aaa", which already exists in the DataSet. adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "Aaa"); // Adds a new table called "Aaa". ```如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>稱為和<xref:System.Data.DataSet>只包含<xref:System.Data.DataTable>名稱只有大小寫不同的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>會更新。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the comparison is case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，這個比較是不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following C# code illustrates this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 程式碼說明這個行為。

trans-unit.source: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "AAA"); // Fills the schema of table "aaa" because only one similarly named table is in the DataSet. ``` The <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> object associated with the select command must be valid, but it does not need to open.
trans-unit.target: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "AAA"); // Fills the schema of table "aaa" because only one similarly named table is in the DataSet. ```<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>Select 命令相關聯的物件必須有效，但不需要開啟。</xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection> is closed before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>前已關閉<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>是呼叫，它會開啟擷取資料，然後關閉。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.IDbConnection>

trans-unit.source: If the connection is open before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called, it is left open.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接為開啟之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>是呼叫，它仍然為開啟狀態。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時處理批次 SQL 陳述式會傳回多個結果，實作<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>的.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 擷取結構描述資訊，只有第一個結果。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> with the <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> set to `AddWithKey`.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取多個結果的結構描述資訊，請使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>與<xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>設`AddWithKey`。</xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>, the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server appends a FOR BROWSE clause to the statement being executed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>，.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 會將 FOR BROWSE 子句附加至正在執行的陳述式。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should be aware of potential side effects, such as interference with the use of SET FMTONLY ON statements.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該注意潛在的副作用，例如使用 SET FMTONLY ON 陳述式的干擾。

trans-unit.source: See SQL Server Books Online for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 線上叢書 》。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to insert the schema in.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>插入結構描述中的。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref> values that specify how to insert the schema.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>指定如何插入結構描述的值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the source table to use for table mapping.
trans-unit.target: 要用於資料表對應的來源資料表的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> objects that were added to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合的參考<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>物件新增至<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A source table from which to get the schema could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到要從中取得結構描述的來源資料表。

trans-unit.source: Configures the schema of the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> based on the specified <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>, command string, and <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的結構描述<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>根據指定<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"> </xref>，命令字串，並<xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> method retrieves the schema from the data source using the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>方法會擷取使用<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>資料來源的結構描述</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection object associated with the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> must be valid, but it does not need to be open.
trans-unit.target: 連接物件相關聯<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>必須有效，但它不需要開啟。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the connection is closed before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接已關閉之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>是呼叫，它會開啟擷取資料，然後關閉。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the connection is open before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called, it remains open.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接為開啟之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>是呼叫，它會保持開啟狀態。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> operation adds a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> to the destination <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>作業會將加入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>到目的地<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then adds columns to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, and configures the following <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> properties if they exist at the data source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 接著它會加入至資料行<xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，並設定下列<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>屬性如果存在於資料來源:- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: You must set <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> separately.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A>個別。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> also configures the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A> properties according to the following rules: - If one or more primary key columns are returned by the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, they are used as the primary key columns for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>-<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>也會設定<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A>屬性根據下列規則:-如果一或多個主索引鍵資料行所傳回的<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>，它們會當做<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>的主索引鍵資料行</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A></xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A></xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A></xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if, and only if, all the unique columns are nonnullable.
trans-unit.target: -如果傳回沒有主索引鍵資料行，但是唯一的資料行，唯一的資料行可用的主索引鍵，如果且只有唯一的資料行都不可為 null。

trans-unit.source: If any of the columns are nullable, a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>, but the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何資料行可為 null，<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>加入至<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>，但<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>屬性未設定。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: - If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: -如果傳回主要索引鍵資料行，唯一的資料行，主索引鍵資料行作為主索引鍵資料行<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> according to the preceding rules, but other constraint types are not added.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，會將主索引鍵和唯一條件約束加入至<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>根據前述規則，但其他條件約束類型不會加入。</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>

trans-unit.source: If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果唯一叢集索引上的資料行或 SQL Server 資料表中的資料行定義和叢集索引中的資料行的名稱將會傳回一組個別的資料行上定義主索引鍵條件約束。

trans-unit.source: To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳回的主索引鍵資料行的名稱，使用指定名稱的主索引鍵的 SELECT 陳述式中的查詢提示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定查詢提示的詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> encounters duplicate columns while populating a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>遇到重複的資料行在填入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，它會產生後續的資料行，並使用模式的名稱"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3 」，依此類推。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們會放置於<xref:System.Data.DataSet>根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，等等。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When multiple result sets are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> each result set is placed in a separate table.
trans-unit.target: 當多個結果集加入至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>放置於個別的資料表中每個結果集。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on.).
trans-unit.target: 其他結果集的命名方式是附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"等。） 的整數值。

trans-unit.source: Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料行和資料表名稱的應用程式應確保這些命名模式衝突不會發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> does not return any rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>不會傳回任何資料列。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method to add rows to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>要加入資料列至<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>方法</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時處理批次 SQL 陳述式會傳回多個結果，實作<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>的.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 擷取結構描述資訊，只有第一個結果。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> with the <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> set to `AddWithKey`.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取多個結果的結構描述資訊，請使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>與<xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>設`AddWithKey`。</xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>, the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server appends a FOR BROWSE clause to the statement being executed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>，.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 會將 FOR BROWSE 子句附加至正在執行的陳述式。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should be aware of potential side effects, such as interference with the use of SET FMTONLY ON statements.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該注意潛在的副作用，例如使用 SET FMTONLY ON 陳述式的干擾。

trans-unit.source: See SQL Server Books Online for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 線上叢書 》。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to be filled with the schema from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>来填入資料來源的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The SQL SELECT statement used to retrieve rows from the data source.
trans-unit.target: SQL SELECT 陳述式用於從資料來源擷取資料列。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A of <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object that contains schema information returned from the data source.
trans-unit.target: A 的<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>從資料來源傳回的物件，其中包含結構描述資訊。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>並設定基礎結構描述要比對資料來源中指定<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> method retrieves the schema from the data source using the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>方法會擷取使用<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>資料來源的結構描述</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection object associated with the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> must be valid, but it does not need to be open.
trans-unit.target: 連接物件相關聯<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>必須有效，但它不需要開啟。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the connection is closed before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接已關閉之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>是呼叫，它會開啟擷取資料，然後關閉。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the connection is open before <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called, it remains open.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接為開啟之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>是呼叫，它會保持開啟狀態。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> operation adds a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> to the destination <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>作業會將加入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>到目的地<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then adds columns to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, and configures the following <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> properties if they exist at the data source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 接著它會加入至資料行<xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，並設定下列<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>屬性如果存在於資料來源:- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: You must set <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> separately.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A>個別。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> also configures the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A> properties according to the following rules: - If one or more primary key columns are returned by the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, they are used as the primary key columns for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>-<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>也會設定<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A>屬性根據下列規則:-如果一或多個主索引鍵資料行所傳回的<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>，它們會當做<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>的主索引鍵資料行</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A></xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A></xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A></xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if, and only if, all the unique columns are nonnullable.
trans-unit.target: -如果傳回沒有主索引鍵資料行，但是唯一的資料行，唯一的資料行可用的主索引鍵，如果且只有唯一的資料行都不可為 null。

trans-unit.source: If any of the columns are nullable, a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>, but the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何資料行可為 null，<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>加入至<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>，但<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>屬性未設定。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: - If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: -如果傳回主要索引鍵資料行，唯一的資料行，主索引鍵資料行作為主索引鍵資料行<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> according to the preceding rules, but other constraint types are not added.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，會將主索引鍵和唯一條件約束加入至<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>根據前述規則，但其他條件約束類型不會加入。</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>

trans-unit.source: If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果唯一叢集索引上的資料行或 SQL Server 資料表中的資料行定義和叢集索引中的資料行的名稱將會傳回一組個別的資料行上定義主索引鍵條件約束。

trans-unit.source: To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳回的主索引鍵資料行的名稱，使用指定名稱的主索引鍵的 SELECT 陳述式中的查詢提示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定查詢提示的詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> encounters duplicate columns while populating a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>遇到重複的資料行在填入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，它會產生後續的資料行，並使用模式的名稱"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3 」，依此類推。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們會放置於<xref:System.Data.DataSet>根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，等等。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When multiple result sets are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> each result set is placed in a separate table.
trans-unit.target: 當多個結果集加入至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>放置於個別的資料表中每個結果集。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on.).
trans-unit.target: 其他結果集的命名方式是附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"等。） 的整數值。

trans-unit.source: Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料行和資料表名稱的應用程式應確保這些命名模式衝突不會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> method supports scenarios where the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains multiple <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects whose names differ only by case.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>方法支援案例其中<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含多個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>名稱只有大小寫不同的物件。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: In such situations, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> performs a case-sensitive comparison to find the corresponding table, and creates a new table if no exact match exists.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>執行區分大小寫的比較，來尋找對應的資料表，並建立新的資料表，如果沒有完全相符項目存在。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# code illustrates this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 程式碼說明這個行為。

trans-unit.source: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); dataset.Tables.Add("AAA"); adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "aaa"); // Fills the schema of "aaa", which already exists in the DataSet. adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "Aaa"); // Adds a new table called "Aaa". ``` If <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> is called and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains only one <xref:System.Data.DataTable> whose name differs only by case, that <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is updated.
trans-unit.target: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); dataset.Tables.Add("AAA"); adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "aaa"); // Fills the schema of "aaa", which already exists in the DataSet. adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "Aaa"); // Adds a new table called "Aaa". ```如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>稱為和<xref:System.Data.DataSet>只包含<xref:System.Data.DataTable>名稱只有大小寫不同的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>會更新。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the comparison is case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，這個比較是不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following C# code illustrates this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 程式碼說明這個行為。

trans-unit.source: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "AAA"); // Fills the schema of table "aaa" because only one similarly named table is in the DataSet. ``` <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> does not return any rows.
trans-unit.target: ``` DataSet dataset = new DataSet(); dataset.Tables.Add("aaa"); adapter.FillSchema(dataset, "AAA"); // Fills the schema of table "aaa" because only one similarly named table is in the DataSet. ``` <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>不會傳回任何資料列。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method to add rows to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>要加入資料列至<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>方法</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時處理批次 SQL 陳述式會傳回多個結果，實作<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>的.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 擷取結構描述資訊，只有第一個結果。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> with the <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> set to `AddWithKey`.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取多個結果的結構描述資訊，請使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>與<xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>設`AddWithKey`。</xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>, the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server appends a FOR BROWSE clause to the statement being executed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>，.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 會將 FOR BROWSE 子句附加至正在執行的陳述式。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should be aware of potential side effects, such as interference with the use of SET FMTONLY ON statements.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該注意潛在的副作用，例如使用 SET FMTONLY ON 陳述式的干擾。

trans-unit.source: See SQL Server Books Online for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 線上叢書 》。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to be filled with the schema from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>来填入資料來源的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The SQL SELECT statement used to retrieve rows from the data source.
trans-unit.target: SQL SELECT 陳述式用於從資料來源擷取資料列。

trans-unit.source: The name of the source table to use for table mapping.
trans-unit.target: 要用於資料表對應的來源資料表的名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.CommandBehavior"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> objects that contain schema information returned from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>從資料來源傳回的物件，其中包含結構描述資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref> from one of the commands in the current batch.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref>個目前的批次中的命令數。

trans-unit.source: In <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>, this method throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 在中<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>，這個方法會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> override this method to provide support for batches.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>覆寫這個方法以提供支援批次。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The index of the command to retrieve the parameter from.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中擷取參數命令的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the parameter within the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令參數的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"> </xref>指定。

trans-unit.source: The adapter does not support batches.
trans-unit.target: 配接器不支援批次。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about an individual update attempt within a larger batched update.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在較大的批次更新內嘗試個別更新的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Data providers that support batched updating logic must override a series of virtual methods on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: 支援批次更新邏輯的資料提供者必須覆寫一系列的<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>類別</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>上的虛擬方法

trans-unit.source: `GetBatchedRecordsAffected` represents one of those virtual methods.
trans-unit.target: `GetBatchedRecordsAffected`代表其中一個這些虛擬方法。

trans-unit.source: The `DbDataAdapter` class relies on `GetBatchedRecordsAffected` to determine the success or failure of individual update attempts within a batch so it can mark each corresponding <xref:System.Data.DataRow> accordingly.
trans-unit.target: `DbDataAdapter`類別會倚賴`GetBatchedRecordsAffected`來判斷成功或失敗的批次內的個別更新嘗試，因此它可以將標記各有一個對應<xref:System.Data.DataRow>據以。</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal of the individual command within the batch.
trans-unit.target: 個別命令批次內之以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected in the data store by the specified command within the batch.
trans-unit.target: 受影響的資料存放區中所指定的命令批次內的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> thrown during execution of the specified command.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>指定命令執行期間擲回。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 如果擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Information about an individual update attempt within a larger batched update.
trans-unit.target: 在較大的批次更新內嘗試個別更新的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters set by the user when executing an SQL SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行的 SQL SELECT 陳述式時，使用者所設定的參數。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref> objects that contains the parameters set by the user.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref>使用者設定物件，包含的參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes batching for the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的批次<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>, this method throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 在中<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>，這個方法會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> override this method to provide support for batches.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>覆寫這個方法以提供支援批次。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The adapter does not support batches.
trans-unit.target: 配接器不支援批次。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a command used to insert new records into the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來將新記錄插入至資料來源的命令。

trans-unit.source: During <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> will be automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 期間<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>，如果沒有設定這個屬性，並且出現在主索引鍵資訊<xref:System.Data.DataSet>、<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>就會自動產生。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> used during <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Update*> to insert records in the data source for new rows in the data set.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref>期間使用<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Update*>插入新資料列的資料集的資料來源中的記錄。</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RowUpdated" name="RowUpdated" href=""></xref> event of a .NET Framework data provider.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref uid="langword_csharp_RowUpdated" name="RowUpdated" href=""> </xref> .NET Framework 資料提供者的事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For an overview, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需概觀，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
